name: Markings on the Kitchen Wall | Radek Close Up
description:
# Markings on the Kitchen Wall

---

Radek is a former coal mine electrician living in Silesia.

More than 30 years ago he built a windmill in his backyard. Three stories high it produced electricity for him and his family.

Today he retrofitted it with solar panels, selling electricity collected back to his city's network.

He is the primary reason for my creativity – when I was a kid he would spend hours teaching me how to weld, build and modify anything we could think of. Because of him, anything seems possible.

--- 

Proceeds are used to print the project's photo book "Markings on the Kitchen Wall"
Every 1/1 holder is able to claim a physical copy for free (no shipping cost)
1/1s available on OpenSea: https://opensea.io/collection/motkw

---

Picture taken, developed and scanned by Richard David.
Photographed on analog film with a large format camera
